<!--- Blog 2 --->
<strong style="color:black;font-size:22px;"> Getting GIS data from APIS in R </strong> [[Slides here]]()

* Plotting Simple Features
* OpenStreetMap
* Google Maps: Geocoding Addresses
* Google Places: googleway

```{r,eval=F}
## require packages
require(pacman)
p_load(leaflet,sf,osmdata)

## getting data
bus_station = opq(bbox = getbb("Bogotá Colombia")) %>%
              add_osm_feature(key = "amenity", value = "bus_station") %>%
              osmdata_sf() %>% .$osm_points

## view data
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% 
addCircleMarkers(data=bus_station , weight=1 , col="red")
```
```{r,echo=F,message=FALSE,fig.height=4,fig.width=6}
# voy a cargar los datos acá para que no tenga que descargarlos toda las veces que corra la presentación
require(pacman)
p_load(leaflet,sf,rio)
bus_station = import("https://eduard-martinez.github.io/data/osm/bog_bus_station.rds") %>% .$osm_points
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addCircleMarkers(data=bus_station , weight=1 , col="red")
```
